subject: Welcome Email
body:
Hi Bob,

Welcome to the email simulator app!

Best,
Alice

subject: Need help for Virtualisation
body:
Hi Prajal,

You worked on virtualised contact list so wanted to check what is the current state and from which Verse release it will be added in feature supported list?

Thanks,
Manoj Kulkarni

subject: Safelinx connection issue
body:
Hi Kandarpa,

Facing the issue for connecting to safelinx server 1. Can you look into the issue?

Thanks,
Manoj Kulkarni

subject: OIDC support in safelinx
body:
Hi Kandarpa,

Can we work on adding OIDC login support in safelinx. Lets work on initial POC for same and check the feasibility.

Thanks,
Manoj Kulkarni

subject: Passkey endpoints and Authenticator signals
body:
Hi Atul,

We need explore the passkey endpoints functionality and explore around the authenticator signal APIs.
Reply with the findings.

Thanks,
Manoj Kulkarni.
